org.terrier.utility.io

Class DebuggingDataOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.utility.io.DebuggingDataOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataOutput

    public class DebuggingDataOutput
extends Object
implements DataOutput
    Debugging code to test classes that implement DataOutput

    4.0
    Author:
    Craig Macdonald
